page.title: 09Business Office by Sandhills
page.content: The offices of Nielson's business services is by the A40 near Sandhills. The offices are in a three story building which is in the grounds of an Edwardian house. They do work for manufacturers of any product using a method called "retail audit". They send specially trained people into shops and record information about stocks, purchases and prices. All the data they collect is put into the computer which shows how well the product is doing. Nielson's has opened branches in many other countries all over the world. Altogether 26 countries have offices: Austria,Portugal,South Africa etc. The Nielson Organisation was started in the United States in the 1920's. An office was opened in Great Britain in 1939. In Oxford 600 people are employed.
